methods.name: glm::linearGradient
methods.parameters: const glm::vec2 &Point0=P, const glm::vec2 &Point1=P, const glm::vec2 &Position=P
methods.short:
Return a color from a linear gradient.

See also: - gtx_gradient_paint

methods.name: glm::radialGradient
methods.parameters: const glm::vec2 &Center=P, const T &Radius, const glm::vec2 &Focal=P, const glm::vec2 &Position=P
methods.short:
Return a color from a radial gradient.

See also: - gtx_gradient_paint
